overview: Carlo (Gerald Lauron) is a kind and obedient son who just happen to earn a living as a male stripper in a gay bar. Fate intervenes when he meets Jerome (Emilio Garcia), a gay production manager who helps him alleviate his desperate situation with his family. Carlo then realized he was gay after rejecting a flirty woman who is attracted to him. Eventually, Carlo and Jerome lived happily ever after together.
title: Mapanukso
